0101110000100000 1011110001111100 1 -> sum: 0001100010011101, cout: 1
1000011110001011 1011100110100001 1 -> sum: 0100000100101101, cout: 1

1110101011110000 1011001010010110 1 -> sum: 1001110110000111, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
